Glyphosate

Note. Use the weights function as this then accounts for number of individuals.

```{r}
library(drc)

gly_chronic <- read.csv("output/wos128_chronic_glyphosate.csv")

gly_chronic_mod <- drm(alive/total ~ dose, data = gly_chronic, fct = LL.3(), weights = total, type = "binomial")

plot(gly_chronic_mod)

summary(gly_chronic_mod)

ED(gly_chronic_mod, respLev = c(50), level = 0.95)
```

Roundup

```{r}
roundup_chronic <- read.csv("output/wos128_chronic_roundup.csv")

roundup_chronic_mod <- drm(alive/total ~ dose, data = roundup_chronic, fct = LL.3(), weights = total, type = "binomial")

plot(roundup_chronic_mod)

summary(roundup_chronic_mod)

ED(roundup_chronic_mod, respLev = c(50), level = 0.95)
```
